Package edu.ycp.cs201.cards

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Class representing a playing card.
    KlondikeController
    The controller class implements all of the logic required to play a game of Klondike.
    KlondikeModel
    Model class storing information about a Klondike game in progress.
    Location
    A Location object represents the source of a move or the destination of a move: the LocationType, the pile index (for foundation and tableau piles, which pile), and the card index (which card from the source pile is being moved).
    Pile
    Class to represent a pile of Cards.
    Selection
    A Selection object represents one or more cards that the user wants to move.
    StringifyGameState
    Convert the game state (as stored in the KlondikeModel) to and from strings.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Color
    Suit color enumeration.
    LocationType
    Enumeration representing the different types of "locations": sources and destinations of card moves.
    Rank
    Card rank enumeration.
    Suit
    Card suits.
